isis.stitle: TSI 05-12-25 - Service Replacement Radiators Shipped With and Without Isolators

subjectgroup.subject: Service Replacement Radiators Shipped With and Without Isolators

geninfo.para: Service replacement radiator assemblies, for all models built after January 1, 1995, may have isolators that are different than the isolators used when the vehicle was manufactured. It is important to use the isolators included with the radiator to maximize the life of the radiator.

item.para: If the replacement radiator is shipped with new isolators, they replace the original isolators and must be used.

If the replacement radiator is shipped without isolators, install the radiator as furnished using the original isolators. NOTE: If the original isolators show signs of damage, they should be replaced.
